mean_cn: n.格格声；发出嘎嘎声的儿童玩具；（响尾蛇）音响器官；  v.（使）发出格格声；（人或车）疾驰；使烦扰
mean_en: a series of short loud sounds made when hard objects hit against each other; a baby’s toy that makes a series of short loud sounds when it is shaken; a wooden object that is held in one hand and makes a series of short loud sounds when you spin it round, used, for example, by people watching a sports game
sentence: The baby loved the sound of the rattle.
sentence_trans: 这个婴儿喜欢咔嗒咔嗒的声音。
